children.subject: I would like to add that UPE also has free drop in tutoring as well. Schedule at http://upe.berkeley.edu/oh/.

history.content:
Dear students,

Hope the new semester is going well!

We wanted to remind you that there are plenty of resources (FREE!) available to supplement office hours, etc. 

  • HKN does weekly drop in tutoring in Soda. You can get their schedule here: https://hkn.eecs.berkeley.edu/tutor
  • CoE has a center in Bechtel that is dedicated to tutoring: http://engineering.berkeley.edu/…/tutorin…/tutoring-schedule
  • Weekly 1-1 tutoring will start after the first midterm for 61A/B via Intro to Teaching CS: http://berkeley-cs370.github.io (will be posted on Piazza)
  • Weekly group tutoring provided by Computer Science Mentors for 61A/B should be starting up soon: : http://csmberkeley.github.io/join-us/students Details should be posted on Piazza.
  • The Student Learning Center tutors in all other non-CS subjects: http://slc.berkeley.edu/academic-programs-and-services

Please do engage these resources as they can make a tremendous difference in your experience as you begin your study here at UC Berkeley.
history.subject: Tutoring Resources
